creator: anthonyh@ca.ibm.com
text:
http://apache.sunsite.ualberta.ca/xmlgraphics/batik/README.txt

Last updated: March 29, 2007

The latest Batik version is 1.7beta1, which is the recommended 
version.  Despite its name, it is reasonably stable.  Since it has
been a while since the previous release, the plan is to make a full
1.7 release in the not too distant future.  Note that all the builds
that were offered earlier are still available in the Apache archives.

I am looking at https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=189139 for 
Eclipse GMF and would like to see an full release of Batik 1.7.

Can this be scheduled?

I indeed would like to make a release within a month or so, since I think most 
of the major bugs from 1.7beta1 have been fixed.  The release is really just 
gated on the free time that the (few) developers have at the moment, which 
seems to be minimal.  I will have a bit of time in a couple of weeks, so I'll 
probably start looking into the release then.

(Marking INVALID, since not having a release isn't really a bug.  Please 
discuss this instead on the batik-users mailing list.)
creator: cam@apache.org
